pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flexible Relative Survival // Perform relative survival analyses using approaches described in Remontet et al. (2007) DOI:10.1002/sim.2656 and Mahboubi et al. (2011) DOI:10.1002/sim.4208. It implements non-linear, non- proportional effects and both non proportional and non linear effects using splines (B-spline and truncated power basis).
